A containing the version of the new instance.

MemberSignature.Value: protected FullBox (TagLib.Mpeg4.BoxHeader header, TagLib.File file, TagLib.Mpeg4.IsoHandlerBox handler);

Docs.param: A containing information about the new instance, including the position at which to read.
A to containing the box to read.
A to use as a handler for the new instance.
Docs.summary: Constructs and initializes a new instance of by reading the contents from a file.
This class provides access to ISO/IEC 14496-12 FullBoxes.
